dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, Professor. Here's what's happening today.

subjects.title: Courses
subjects.subtitle: Manage your active courses and marking schemes.
subjects.no_courses_desc: Get started by creating your first course to manage students, grades, and attendance.
subjects.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this course?

students.title: Student Roster
students.subtitle: Directory of all enrolled students.
students.no_students_desc: Add a student to get started.

grades.title: Grade Center
grades.subtitle: Input and manage student grades.
grades.select_subject_prompt: Please select a course to start grading.
grades.no_students_prompt: Add students in the "Student Roster" tab to see them here.

attendance.title: Attendance
attendance.subtitle: Track and manage student absences.
attendance.select_subject_prompt: Select a subject to manage attendance.
attendance.no_students_enrolled: No students enrolled in the system.

reports.title: Reports Center
reports.subtitle: Generate and download course performance reports.

pdf.title: Printable Report (PDF)

excel.title: Raw Data (Excel)
excel.description: Export all detailed records to a spreadsheet. Ideal for performing custom analysis, importing into other systems, or creating backups.
